titlStmt.titl: Mule deer and white-tail deer hybrid data

citation.biblCit: Russell, Ty, 2021, "Mule deer and white-tail deer hybrid data", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/FSRWR4, UAL Dataverse, V1, UNF:6:QxRx/mVPNpXPJWTuqtQVBg== [fileUNF]

titlStmt.titl: Mule deer and white-tail deer hybrid data

stdyInfo.abstract: Genetic analysis of mule deer and white-tail deer in Alberta at 40 species discriminating SNP (single nucleotide polymorphism) loci. Included in this dataset is the genotype file and associated R script demonstrating analyses for the simulation aspect of the study. Empirical results can be reproduced using the genotypes and adapting the R code as needed.

citation.biblCit: Russell et al. Evaluating introgressive hybridization of mule and white-tailed deer in Western Canada. Evolutionary Applications (in review)

otherMat.txt: Simulating hybrids and analyzing the assignment results from STRUCTURE and NewHybrids
